extension.name: regexp
extension.summary: MySQL functions emulating a subset of the Oracle REGEXP functions
extension.description: The functions provided by this package provide a subset of the functionality provided by the Oracle regular expression functions.

function.name: regexp_like
function.summary: Compare strings against a regular expression pattern

function.name: regexp_substr

test.code: -- checking simple case SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR("abc 123 def", "[[:digit:]]+") AS r1;
test.result: r7 abc r8 ABC r9 abc r10 ABC
r11 abc r12 NULL r13 NULL r14 ABC

function.name: regexp_instr

test.code: -- simple match SELECT REGEXP_INSTR("the quick brown fox jumps ...", "fox") AS r1;

function.name: regexp_replace

test.code: -- simple check SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE("lala foo lala", "foo", "bar") AS r1;
-- multiple match check SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE("lala foo lala foo lalala", "foo", "bar") AS r1;
test.result: r1 lala bar lala bar lalala
r1 lala bar lala bar lalala r2 lala foo lala bar lalala
r1 lala bar lala bar lalala r2 lala bar lala foo lalala r3 lala foo lala bar lalala
